code:
flowchart TB

cve["CVE reported"]
investigate[Check package version with fix]
import{Directly imported
package}
major{"Package resolution
version increase"}
patchMajor[[Supress and raise a ticket]]
patchMinor[["Update package(s) and test"]]
children[Investigate yarn.lock to find imported packages]
childUpdate{"Do containing packages
have minor/patch versions 
with the fix?"}
childMajor[[Add resolution, test and raise a ticket]]

cve --> investigate
investigate --> major
import -- Yes --> patchMinor
major -- "Major update" --> patchMajor
major -- "Minor or patch update" --> import
import -- No --> children
children --> childUpdate
childUpdate -- Yes --> patchMinor
childUpdate -- No --> childMajor
